DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY ALMANAC
DOC.TEXT: In Santa Ana , before shopping_malls and tract homes , the place to shop was Main_Street , which in the 1940s , ' 50s and ' 60s was lined with grand department_stores and elegant shops . One of the grandest stores was the Buffums on Main and 9th streets.The store featured an imposing rock facade framed by large palm_trees . It was home to the famous Yorba Room restaurant , which was decorated in Early California style . On noon each Thursday , models wearing the latest fashions strutted around the restaurant . That Buffums closed_in 1987 . The building is now occupied by the Orange County Department of Probation . Today This is the final day of the weeklong Newport Harbor Christmas Boat Parade . The 86th annual event , which runs from 6:30 to 8:30 p.m. , features about 200 decorated boats . Viewing is available at many locations in the harbor , including restaurants . Grandstand seating is provided by the Newport Harbor Jaycees for a fee of $ 5 to $ 7 . The fee includes shuttle transportation from the Newport Dunes Resort at 1131 Backbay Drive_in Newport Beach .
